sn22.133:1.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ mahākoṭṭhikaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.133:2.1: “Idhāvuso, assutavā puthujjano rūpassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
sn22.133:2.5: viññāṇassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
sn22.133:3.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ mahākoṭṭhikaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.133:4.1: “Idhāvuso, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
sn22.133:4.5: viññāṇassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
